eventName: So Long, Adele: Home Away From Home
storyInfo: Costa has a heart-to-heart talk with his seriously ill grandfather who finally agrees on the demolition issue. Keller gets lost in her thoughts when Eyjafjalla returns the curator's book to her on Costa's behalf. The trade fair hosted by Bison as well as the waterpark built by Swire open at the same time, and Siestan Fashion Street comes alive.

attributes.content: Why study volcanoes?
Because, I hope to play a guitar at the highest spot on Siesta one day. It doesn't have to be at the Obsidian Festival, and preferably at the top of a volcano.
'Volcano Sonatas', that's what I'm planning to call my first album.
I can't wake the volcano up? Ahaha... maybe I should call it 'Volcano Lullabies' instead.
Volcanoes sleep like a log, so I don't think you'll be able to wake it up that easily.
Have you heard of this, about a kind of stone you can find on a volcano?
When the wind blows it away, it makes a sound like beans falling into a bowl.
And if you soak it in water, bubbles fizz like a complex drumline.
Of course it's real. If I find such a stone on a volcano, I'll bring one back to show it to you.
The doctor's been here. How are you feeling today?
attributes.name: Costa

attributes.content: An old man lies on the hospital bed, his head tilted sideways as he looks out the window.
Not so bad, if you hadn't come here to specifically remind me that I'm stuck in bed this summer. And a hospital bed should be more comfortable than an office chair.
attributes.name: Tired Voice

attributes.content: Thanks for sparing the energy to tease me, but my butt hasn't known the touch of a chair for the past few days.
attributes.name: Costa

attributes.content: Perhaps we should switch places.
attributes.name: Tired Voice

attributes.content: The old man turns to look at his grandson standing beside the bed.
So, my boy, why have you come to see me today?
attributes.name: Tired Voice

attributes.content: There's a letter of intent for relocation, that I hope you can sign.
attributes.name: Costa

attributes.content: The city hall staffer whispers the words, as if admitting a mistake.
A tired and bitter silence follows.
It seems like this renovation plan is just so urgent that it can't even wait until I kick the bucket, huh?
attributes.name: Tired Voice

attributes.content: That's not it...
attributes.name: Costa

attributes.content: I just thought you should know about it. Of course, I'd rather get your consent.
attributes.name: Costa

attributes.content: If you want to convince me, you should have at least brought Tysha along to visit.
attributes.name: Tired Voice

attributes.content: She's at work right now...
attributes.name: Costa

attributes.content: Everything you do is to make a living, right? I really don't get why a girl like that would marry a boring man like you.
attributes.name: Tired Voice

attributes.content: Let's just say I've inherited your talent for making girls happy.
attributes.name: Costa

attributes.content: Hmph...
attributes.name: Tired Voice

attributes.content: The hospital ward is quiet, except for the faint sound of fruit being peeled.
Work must have been tough these last few days.
attributes.name: Tired Voice

attributes.content: I've been having nothing but bizarre dreams lately. But after some thinking, I figured I haven't offended anyone, so my guess is that you've been chewed out by a whole lot of people.
attributes.name: Tired Voice

attributes.content: Clever old man, you know my job so well.
attributes.name: Costa

attributes.content: Well, what's your take? Are you really willing to let this shopping street get demolished, and see the last traces of Old Siesta disappear?
attributes.name: Tired Voice

attributes.content: Costa, there's a guitar in the cabinet behind you. Take it out and play a song for me.
attributes.name: Tired Voice

attributes.content: No thanks... you know that won't work...
attributes.name: Costa

attributes.content: The old man speaks no more, and turns his head away toward the window.
I know that Mockingbird Café has been in Siesta longer than the city hall. Many of the shops on that street chose to stay when we moved from the volcano.
attributes.name: Costa

attributes.content: But there are too many factors at play that make our life difficult, and the volcano doesn't even make the list.
attributes.name: Costa

attributes.content: Coffee and music can only keep people alive at certain times. If I hadn't lucked out and gotten this job at city hall, your medical bills would be too big a burden on the family.
attributes.name: Costa

attributes.content: I'm not complaining, it's just—
attributes.name: Costa

attributes.content: Alright, hand me a pen.
attributes.name: Tired Voice

attributes.content: You're such a brat, Costa. I hate that about you.
attributes.name: Tired Voice

attributes.content: Maybe I should have tossed you into the sea back when you were mixing your drip coffee with sparkling water.
attributes.name: Tired Voice

attributes.content: Thank you very much for not doing that... I do like that about you.
attributes.name: Costa

attributes.content: You want to rent my hotel?
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: And make a little modification to the hot springs, with your permission of course—price is negotiable.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I'm not interested in money. It's all the same, not a shred of beauty!
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: Well, money isn't the only bargaining chip. I definitely have something here that you'll be very interested in.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Like this, for example?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: This photo... is that a piece of exhibit-grade obsidian?!
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: So how about renting these few hot spring hotels of yours to me for a few days, and I'll move this piece of obsidian over?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Don't play around with me, this is from some private museum's precious collection, how could you—
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: Wait, you...?
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: Uh-huh.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: You'll keep your word?
attributes.name: Pelipper

attributes.content: Words hold no proof, so let's sign a contract, shall we?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Snowsant, can you do some research to check if my plan is feasible?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: It's probably... doable...
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: Good, that means it is! I'll trust your judgement.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: No, no, no...! I'm not certain, I'll need some tools and materials... and a bit of... no, a lot of time!
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: Ga yau! I'll move on to the next step.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Since we've decided to focus on making the residents of this street welcome our redevelopment, we'll have to make sure it's perfect.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: We can't waste this chance, with all the tourists drawn in by Bison's ads for his trade fair...
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: (No, not here...)
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: ('Data Model for Volcanic Eruptions' is definitely not in the files Professor Magna left for Adele.)
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: (But why does Keller have this notebook with her...?)
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: Good work today. Cup of coffee?
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: Ah, no thanks, I'm not a coffee person... is Adele here today?
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: Today isn't a work day, so what are you doing here?
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: Do you need these old documents for your work over at city hall?
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: Keller, why on Terra did you invite Adele here?
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: I believe I made it quite clear before. The research in this museum is related to the Naumanns, and the imminent eruption of Siesta's volcano is a rare observation opportunity.
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: Adele is their child, and also an excellent volcanologist, so it is only right I extend an invitation to her.
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: Only now, after so many years with zero contact?
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: You didn't attend the Naumanns' funeral after the incident at Mount Unna. You vanished without a trace from academic circles, and stopped your teaching work at the school a year ago.
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: Just what have you been up to these last few years? What are you running from?
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: As you can see, the only thing I've done these past few years is organize all the volcanic research materials that now sit in this very museum.
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: Kahn, everyone has their limits. I no longer have any energy to do volcano field work. I'm preparing to retire after the museum is finished, and I've observed Mount Siesta's eruption.
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: What... retire? Why would you even consider 'retirement' at all?
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: The Naumanns left all their unpublished research data to you and Adele, enough to make your mark on the academic world, and yet now you're saying you want to retire?
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: Or could it be that you've already placed a price tag on that data behind closed doors and gained something even better in exchange?
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: Kahn, I don't know what you're—
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: Professor Keller, are you in here?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: ...Keller.
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: Whatever your plans, I hope you'll consider the Naumanns before making any decisions.
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: Adele is their only child, and the only hope they've left behind. She's already contracted Oripathy, and her condition isn't the best either...
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: ...I just hope she can be happy and free.
attributes.name: Kahn

attributes.content: Professor Keller?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: ...I'm in here, Adele. Come in!
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: Professor Keller, I found the exhibit, and already put it back in the display cabinet.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Alright... good work.
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: Professor, what's wrong?
attributes.name: Adele
Keller
attributes.content: ...Nothing much.

attributes.name: Keller
attributes.content: Where did you find the exhibit?
It was with a beckbeast that sneaked into the museum...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: How strange...
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: Alright, if there's nothing else, you can—
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: Professor Keller, there's something else I wanted to mention! I met a shopkeeper on the street, and he asked me to return this book to you.
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: A shopkeeper in the commercial street?
attributes.name: Keller

attributes.content: Bang!
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: I can taste the fatigue in the air, so painfully bitter and sickeningly sour. Just who is it coming from?
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: Mr. Dolly! You scared me... why are you here?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: I just saw a beautiful streak of blue across the city. Want to go to a hot spring?
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: Mr. Dolly, I still have some research to do...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: No, no, no. 'Research', such a bitter word it makes you all wrinkly. The volcano is right there, and the material won't disappear either, so you can always come back to continue your research anytime, but—
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: Dolly lightly tips his toes and spins in mid-air, in what looks to be a somewhat comical dance.
Some things are so fleeting that you'll never get a second chance to see if you miss it.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: For example—
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: Eyja—finally found you!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Let's go. Want to visit the hot springs together?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Hot springs?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: I don't have the ability to control people's hearts, by the way.
attributes.name: Dolly

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: But what? Didn't bring a swimsuit? That's fine, I have some over there!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Besides us two, Snowsant will be there too, and we'll also call Ceylon in a bit. I even bought some of the latest facial cream—they say there's volcanic ash inside.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Plus, I have an important thing to ask of you, and you're the only one who can do it!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Is this... the latest record player on the Columbian market? I didn't think I would be able to see one in Siesta...! I've been paying close attention, they only started selling these just a few days ago!
attributes.name: Tourist A

attributes.content: But these are the leftover stock, you already missed the first wave...
attributes.name: Tourist B

attributes.content: You don't know this, but there was a super long line here this morning. The limited editions with Emperor's signature even come with a copy of his latest album, and that sold out forever ago!
attributes.name: Tourist B

attributes.content: EMPEROR'S LATEST ALBUM?! Isn't that dropping next week? Is this what they call an early access batch? Who could even pull this off?!
attributes.name: Tourist A

attributes.content: It's not just Emperor's album either! There's also signed copies of Miss Sora's album, a Kazimierzian Radiant Knight helmet model replica, and 'Czerny's Klavier Kollektion'! ...Wait, what's this?
attributes.name: Tourist C

attributes.content: Huh, to think I'd find one of our Sargonian Crabbie Pumpies here... but what use does it even have here in Siesta?
attributes.name: Tourist B

attributes.content: Who cares, it's cute and that's all that matters! Did you miss the line of people queueing up to buy them?
attributes.name: Tourist C

attributes.content: Whoa, they even got dates here!
attributes.name: Tourist B

attributes.content: Dates?
attributes.name: Byrd

attributes.content: Excuse me, Mr. Sargonian.
attributes.name: Byrd

attributes.content: Byrd casually strums a Sargon style ditty.
Can you tell me a story of plucking dates in the hot and dry breeze?
attributes.name: Byrd

attributes.content: This are instruments imported from Leithanien, and I have to say, those Leithanians sure are stellar at any music-related stuff. You can try if you like, and if you don't know how to play one, I can teach you a little too!
attributes.name: Instrument Shop Owner

attributes.content: The piece I just played? I performed it when me and my wife confessed our feelings to each other, hehe. If you fancy learning it, I have a sheet here that you can have!
attributes.name: Instrument Shop Owner

attributes.content: The best snacks around here, you ask? See that bearded old man on the left? His ice cream is the best!
attributes.name: Instrument Shop Owner

attributes.content: Slowly now, take it easy. Strawberry for you, orange for you, yours is coffee, and what else? Coconut with chocolate? Oww... No need to rush, we have plenty here...
attributes.name: Cold Drinks Shop Owner

attributes.content: Mister, give me a tea flavored one.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Sure, coming right up!
attributes.name: Cold Drinks Shop Owner

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: I'll send this to Schwarz too... it'll will make her drool.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Dr. Ceylon! You here for the trade fair too?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Stopped by for a stroll since I happened to have some time today.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Enis, you good lad! Thanks again for fixing the cash register this morning, things would've been so hectic otherwise.
attributes.name: Cold Drinks Shop Owner

attributes.content: It's nothing, just helping out is all! How's business?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: So good I almost thought I was back in the old Siesta.
attributes.name: Cold Drinks Shop Owner

attributes.content: But why haven't I seen that Costa fellow anywhere today? He spent the whole day running all over the place for this, and now that everything is in motion, that man is nowhere to be found.
attributes.name: Cold Drinks Shop Owner

attributes.content: Maybe there's other work to do at city hall today...
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: That rascal. Doesn't even know how to ditch work...
attributes.name: Cold Drinks Shop Owner

attributes.content: Boss, gimme a cone!
attributes.name: Tourist A

attributes.content: Coming!
attributes.name: Cold Drinks Shop Owner

attributes.content: Feel free to come try our cocktails over at the White Volcano too!
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: ...You brat!
attributes.name: Cold Drinks Shop Owner

attributes.content: Haha!
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Enis leans against the soda fountain, watching the surrounding people come and go.
Did you see my little siblings earlier?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: It's their first time in such a bustling place. They kept clamoring for some volcano coffee or something on our way here, but as soon as I handed them a little pocket money, they were gone in a flash.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Pfft.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Though, I don't think I've spotted any kids here...
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: The little runts aren't here. If you want to find them, you have to over to east street!
attributes.name: Cold Drinks Shop Owner

attributes.content: They say there's a new amusement park over there or something, and my own brat even told me over breakfast he'd help me look after the store. Hmph, I haven't heard from him ever since he learned about the place!
attributes.name: Cold Drinks Shop Owner

attributes.content: An amusement park?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Can I open my eyes now, Miss Swire? Also, what was the important thing you were mentioning earlier?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Did some of those secretly mined obsidian appear in this hotel too? Or do you need a nominal volcanologist for your work? Or...?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Neither!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: No volcanoes here, and no data either. Only a comforting hot spring, so now you just have to get into some pretty clothes, and then—
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Alright, you can open your eyes now!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Wow... there's so many tourists!
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: What happened here? Wasn't it just a hot spring before?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: It's so lively, just like Siesta a few years back...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: A few tourists erupt into cheering, and Adele recovers from her surprise.
There's so many kayaks and water installations here, Miss Swire, are these your...?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Yup, this is the waterpark I'm setting up for the commercial street!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Wow... did you do all of this by yourself?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Not by myself, of course. I provided the plans, but we have our Chief Genius Engineer from Lungmen to thank for making this a reality, Snowsant!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Um! Miss, Miss Swire... that title is a bit too much...!
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: Hmm~? Really now?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Yan's number one, Terra's number one Genius Engineer?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Ahhh—!!
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: Wait, Snowsant! Don't run around like that, be careful!
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Ohhhh—!!
attributes.name: Tourist

attributes.content: It—It's flying—!!
attributes.name: Surprised Tourist Scream

attributes.content: How did you do that? How are these surf kayaks actually flying straight from one hot spring channel to the other?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Um, actually, it's not as complicated as it looks, we just needed to add a pneumatic ejection device on the waterways, so once the kayak reaches this spot, it'll trigger the mechanism, and then it'll—
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: Yay! I can fly!
attributes.name: Surprised Tourist Scream

attributes.content: Mama——!!
attributes.name: Surprised Tourist Scream

attributes.content: Um, there aren't any guardrails on the waterways, so I'm a little worried about—
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: I redesigned the kayaks according to Swire's plan, and they come equipped with a comprehensive emergency cushioning system.
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: It's also the second way you can play with these, as bumper kayaks! They can freely collide on the waterways, and the cushioning system will absorb all the impact force, using it to power the kayaks' water guns that spray water forward.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I didn't mention it to the tourists, but many of them seem to have already mastered this secret.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Look, over there—
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Ah—Ahh—!
attributes.name: Little Tourist Exclaiming

attributes.content: Along with a shriek, a kayak spins in the waterway, seemingly about to fall off the channel.
The airbags at the kayak's edge quickly inflate, wrapping up the passengers. But as the kayak drops, its trajectory is interrupted suddenly, as if there is a transparent barrier in the air.
Water splashes onto the ground, the completely wrapped kayak sways and falls downward.
Hey—! You alright? Anyone hurt?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I'll go take a look first, Eyja. Just wait here a second!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Tourists surround the fallen kayak, but there is only giggling bubbling from the center.
With a puff of the bulging air cushions, two children emerge from within.
Hmph! It's all your fault for moving around so much!
attributes.name: Unhappy Girl

attributes.content: We didn't catch the little lamb, and our 'Siestan Adventure' is ruined!
attributes.name: Unhappy Girl

attributes.content: Nuh-uh, it's not my fault the lamb ran so fast!
attributes.name: Very Happy Boy

attributes.content: Lamb?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: I don't see them here either... it must be tiring taking care of your younger siblings, yes? Children of that age love to play around and make so much noise.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: *sigh* Thanks for the concern, but it's fine this way too. They're having fun at least.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: You have a lot to worry about, as an older brother.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Now that I think back on some past incidents... pfft. I think like a friend might feel the same sometimes.
attributes.name: Ceylon

attributes.content: Do you have an older sibling, Dr. Ceylon? I've never heard—
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: It's your fault! All your fault!
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: Hey! You brats! Where did you run off to?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Enis!
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: It's Enis!
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: We sat on a big air cushion boat, and chased a fluffy little lamb!
attributes.name: Boy & Girl

attributes.content: What are you talking about? What lamb...?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: A fluffy little lamb that lifted our boat up with its head to play with it like a ball!
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: When we catch it, we gotta make it sit in our boat!
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: Enis, over there! The lamb is back!
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: Where?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Look up!
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: Wait, these...
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Our surfboards... why are they flying in the sky?!
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Surfboards and swim rings.
They use the hot spring steam to leap into the air, jumping over Fashion Street and into the sky, beyond the tourists' view.
Everyone's eyes are glued to the objects swirling around as if living creatures.
And Adele sees something slightly different than the others.
The surfboards cruising across the sky have sheep standing on them.
They don't seem content with just racing the waterways—
Hot water, vapor, colorful surfboards and swim rings. The sheep sweep them all up, and together they pour into the hustle and bustle of Fashion Street.
(This is bad...! Dolly said he would teach them a lesson, was he lying to me?)
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: (Oh no, they're splashing the hot spring water everywhere!)
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Snowsant, did you design a flying surfboard behind my back because I rejected your idea for an observation wheel suspended above the hot spring?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Didn't you arrange this, Miss Swire?
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: No... it wasn't me either.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: The two look at each other, and then hesitantly turn their gazes toward Adele, who has been standing to the side the whole time.
Adele...
attributes.name: Snowsant

attributes.content: You...
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: No, no, no! It's not me either!
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Odd. Could it be Bison then?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Yoohoo—! Little lamb, fluffy little lamb!
attributes.name: Girl

attributes.content: The lamb is flying!
attributes.name: Boy

attributes.content: I'll go look!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Whoa—Eyja, Snowsant!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: The surfboards are really flying! Whatever, let's get on those things!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Who's in charge here? Quick, someone should mass-produce these surfboards!
attributes.name: Tourist A

attributes.content: Woohoo!
attributes.name: Tourist B

attributes.content: *sigh* Mr. Dolly...
attributes.name: Adele

attributes.content: Is this the hot spring you were talking about...?
attributes.name: Adele
